summary.why: File-based storage creates mainline commits for entries, causing a chicken-and-egg problem where pending always reports the entry commit as undocumented. Filtering in GetPendingCommits (not callers) ensures all 7 callers benefit. Safe default: unknown files = keep commit.
summary.how: Added git.CommitFiles() using diff-tree, expanded GitOps interface, isLedgerOnlyCommit helper checks all files under .timbers/, filterLedgerOnlyCommits applied to all 3 return paths in GetPendingCommits. 9 test cases across unit and filter tests.
